original_text: Then said Elijah unto the people, I, even I only, remain a prophet of the Lord; but Baal's prophets are four hundred and fifty men.
korean_text: 엘리야가 백성에게 이르되 여호와의 선지자는 나만 홀로 남았으나 바알의 선지자는 사백오십 명이로다

sentences.original_text: Then said Elijah unto the people
I, even I only, remain a prophet of the Lord
but Baal's prophets are four hundred and fifty men
